content: Yes. We’ve made a terrible mistake in letting them make this about “free speech.” This is about “censorship.” They need to actually define what censorship is. It’s not the fact I can’t come into your house and tell you all about my awesome ideas. There is no freedom, no liberty, without free association and free assembly. Defining censorship down as they are doing risks everything, because it presumes there is no right not to hear someone else.
